meanings.definition: The act of adorning with flowers or floral designs.
meanings.sent1: The floriation on the wedding cake added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted delicate floriation on the walls of the garden.
meanings.sent3: The floriation on the birthday card made it look cheerful and festive.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was a floriation of colors, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The floriation in the park was so vibrant, it attracted many butterflies.

meanings.sent1: The vase had intricate floriation etched into its surface.
meanings.sent2: The rug was adorned with beautiful floriation patterns.
meanings.sent3: The floriation on the curtains made the room feel like a garden.
meanings.sent4: Her jewelry box was decorated with delicate floriation designs.
meanings.sent5: The floriation on the china plates was so detailed, it looked real.

meanings.definition: The process of adding floral decorations to something.
meanings.sent1: The floriation of the table centerpiece was done with care.
meanings.sent2: She specialized in the floriation of wedding venues.
meanings.sent3: The floriation of the room for the event was a team effort.
meanings.sent4: The floriation of the garden for the party was a big hit.
meanings.sent5: The floriation of the cake was the highlight of the dessert table.
